snippet: Basketball players from the Robert M. Beren Academy in Houston won the right to compete in a state tournament without having to play on the Jewish Sabbath. Then they had to win their games on the court.
abstract: Geneva School of Boerne boys basketball team defeats Robert M Beren Academy, Orthodox Jewish day school in Houston, Tex, 68-67, in quadruple overtime, to win state semifinal game; Beren players drew worldwide attention in 2012 after refusing to play on the Jewish Sabbath.
lead_paragraph: Basketball players from the Robert M. Beren Academy in Houston won the right to compete in a state tournament without having to play on the Jewish Sabbath. Then they had to win their games on the court.
